summary: I am a programmer with a wide breadth of experience in server, network, and database administration. I look forward to learning and working with new technology to help customers to meet and exceed their needs.

work_experiences.description: Customization of an already open source E-learning platform programmed in Django and AngularJS for journalism teaching use.
accomplishments: Built and maintained a PHP 5.5 cluster system using Zend Server 7.0, NFS server, and MySQL on Amazon AWS cloud services. Created scripts to help with deploying code (specifically, Wordpress and Magento-based sites) to the cloud system. Setup scripts to help with initializing, adding and removing nodes for cluster system
Transferred and maintained a Wordpress multi-site system containing the company's and several clients' websites onto the cluster system
Assisted with performance and other improvements to existing sites for SEO purposes, such as setting up SSL and using CloudFlare to improve response times

work_experiences.description: Designed and implemented of banking solution based on a multi-platform architecture programmed in JAVA, JEE 6 EJB/JSF and Windows phone.
accomplishments: Building a system for use in evaluating nursing students, built in PHP using Zend Framework 1, Doctrine 2, and  jQuery for the website, and an Android tablet application written in Adobe Air and deployed using Adobe Air Mobile runtime.
Finished a job-posting application using Adobe Flash for the web-accessible front end and AMFPHP for the backend.
Updating a custom-built ad-delivery system, using Adobe Flex & AMFPHP, that allowed clients to submit video and image ads that ran on screens in various local businesses.

Heavily modified the above ad-delivery system for custom-built touchscreen headrests running Ubuntu that were to be place in taxis. Included setting up remote auto upgrading capabilities, stats and network tracking using BASH, Python, and C, and setting up OpenVPN and OpenSSH to allow for secure access to the headrests while the taxis they were in were driving around town.
Pushed for the switch from Subversion to Mercurial as the company's version control system, trained and encouraged others in using the git flow model for development with larger projects.
Trained and managed local and remote programmers to accelerate project development.

work_experiences.description: Development of an Application of human resource management (FHRM), it’s a web application developed with spring framework and mongodb as a database.
accomplishments: Moved the codebase into a Subversion repository for better code maintenance.
Improved security and reusability of project parts.
Headed a team of five developers to expand the project.
Added a user authentication and security model using an LDAP connection to Windows 2003 Server Active Directory.
Optimized the data transfer code between the project and an accounting system running on an IBM AIX server.
Converted the project from PHP on a CentOS server with PostgresSQL to PHP running on a Windows Server with SQL Server 2005.

education.school: Private Higher School of Engineering and Technology (ESPRIT)
education.degree: National diploma in Software Computer Science Engineering (DNI)

education.school: Higher Faculty of Sciences of Tunis (FST)
education.degree: National Bachelor in Telecommunication and Computer (BTC)
